name: UCL_ANES_EXCLUSION
description: The UCL_ANES_EXCLUSION table contains information about the period excluded from the anesthesia procedure.

columns.name: UCL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the charge record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANES_EXCL_ST_DT_TM
columns.description: The starting date and time of the period exclusion for the anesthesia.

columns.name: ANES_EXCL_ED_DT_TM
columns.description: The end date and time of the period exclusion for the anesthesia.

columns.name: ANES_EXCL_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment of the period exclusion for the anesthesia.
